DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate contraceptive efficacy , bleed pattern , safety SH D00342A . Subjects participate study treat oral contraceptive pill contain 0.03 mg ethinylestradiol 0.125 mg levonorgestrel .
DOC.brief_title: Pearl Index Study With Low Dose Combined Oral Contraceptive
DOC.detailed_description: The study previously post Schering AG , Germany . Schering AG , Germany rename Bayer Schering Pharma AG , Germany.Bayer Schering Pharma AG , Germany sponsor trial .
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman require contraception Pregnant lactate woman , history suspicion hormone dependent tumor condition forbid participation .
